languages.text: "Почтенные дворяне с семьями разместились в каютах, соответствующих их статусу. Они не забыли страшную уличную резню, а потому первое время регулярно спускались на нижние палубы, чтобы выместить страх и гнев на попавшихся под руку серфах экипажа. Поскольку запирать их в отсеках было бы непочтительно, мы наложили на них оковы иного рода, обспечив обширные и регулярные поставки амасека и дурмана".

"The esteemed nobles and their families were given quarters befitting their status. The horrors of the massacre in the streets are still fresh in their minds, so initially they made regular trips to the lower decks to take out their fears and anger on serfs from our own crew. It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."
languages.original_text: "Почтенные дворяне с семьями разместились в каютах, соответствующих их статусу. Они не забыли страшную уличную резню, а потому первое время регулярно спускались на нижние палубы, чтобы выместить страх и гнев на попавшихся под руку серфах экипажа. Поскольку запирать их в отсеках было бы непочтительно, мы наложили на них оковы иного рода, обспечив обширные и регулярные поставки амасека и дурмана".

It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."

languages.text: 「敬意を払うべき貴族とその一族には、その地位にふさわしい宿舎が与えられております。都市での虐殺の恐怖の記憶がまだ鮮明なのでしょう。彼らはしばしば下層デッキに出ては、乗員の農奴に恐怖と怒りをぶつけていました。貴族たちをコンパートメントへと閉じ込めておくことは無礼に当たりますので、アマセックなどの酩酊物質を惜しみなく与えることで、彼らの枷としました」
languages.original_text: "The esteemed nobles and their families were given quarters befitting their status. The horrors of the massacre in the streets are still fresh in their minds, so initially they made regular trips to the lower decks to take out their fears and anger on serfs from our own crew. It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."

traits.locale_text: 「敬意を払うべき貴族とその一族には、その地位にふさわしい宿舎が与えられております。都市での虐殺の恐怖の記憶がまだ鮮明なのでしょう。彼らはしばしば下層デッキに出ては、乗員の農奴に恐怖と怒りをぶつけていました。貴族たちをコンパートメントへと閉じ込めておくことは無礼に当たりますので、アマセックなどの酩酊物質を惜しみなく与えることで、彼らの枷としました」

languages.text: “贵族成员与他们的家人得到了与地位相称的住处。发生在街头的那场大屠杀让他们记忆犹新，因此刚开始的时候，他们会定期前往底层甲板，将他们的恐惧与愤怒发泄在我们的船员身上。考虑到把贵族锁在房间里不符合礼仪，因此我们采用了另一种方式，为他们提供了艾玛赛克酒和迷酊，让他们老老实实待着。”
languages.original_text: "The esteemed nobles and their families were given quarters befitting their status. The horrors of the massacre in the streets are still fresh in their minds, so initially they made regular trips to the lower decks to take out their fears and anger on serfs from our own crew. It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."

traits.locale_text: “贵族成员与他们的家人得到了与地位相称的住处。发生在街头的那场大屠杀让他们记忆犹新，因此刚开始的时候，他们会定期前往底层甲板，将他们的恐惧与愤怒发泄在我们的船员身上。考虑到把贵族锁在房间里不符合礼仪，因此我们采用了另一种方式，为他们提供了艾玛赛克酒和迷酊，让他们老老实实待着。”

languages.text: « Les nobles et leurs familles se sont vus attribuer des quartiers à la hauteur de leur statut. Les horreurs des massacres survenus dans les rues occupent encore leurs esprits, alors au début, ils descendaient régulièrement sur les ponts inférieurs pour passer leur colère sur les serfs de notre propre équipage. Il aurait été irrespectueux de confiner les nobles dans leurs quartiers, alors nous avons utilisé des entraves d'une autre sorte : nous leur avons fourni de généreuses quantités d'amasec et de stupéfiants. »
languages.original_text: "The esteemed nobles and their families were given quarters befitting their status. The horrors of the massacre in the streets are still fresh in their minds, so initially they made regular trips to the lower decks to take out their fears and anger on serfs from our own crew. It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."

traits.locale_text: « Les nobles et leurs familles se sont vus attribuer des quartiers à la hauteur de leur statut. Les horreurs des massacres survenus dans les rues occupent encore leurs esprits, alors au début, ils descendaient régulièrement sur les ponts inférieurs pour passer leur colère sur les serfs de notre propre équipage. Il aurait été irrespectueux de confiner les nobles dans leurs quartiers, alors nous avons utilisé des entraves d'une autre sorte : nous leur avons fourni de généreuses quantités d'amasec et de stupéfiants. »

languages.text: «Los estimados nobles y sus familias han recibido aposentos dignos de su estatus. Los horrores de la masacre callejera siguen siendo recientes, así que al principio realizaban visitas regulares a las cubiertas inferiores para descargar sus miedos e ira contra los sirvientes de nuestra tripulación. Como habría sido una falta de respeto confinarlos, hemos recurrido a medidas alternativas suministrando grandes cantidades de amasec y estupefacientes».
languages.original_text: "The esteemed nobles and their families were given quarters befitting their status. The horrors of the massacre in the streets are still fresh in their minds, so initially they made regular trips to the lower decks to take out their fears and anger on serfs from our own crew. It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."

traits.locale_text: «Los estimados nobles y sus familias han recibido aposentos dignos de su estatus. Los horrores de la masacre callejera siguen siendo recientes, así que al principio realizaban visitas regulares a las cubiertas inferiores para descargar sus miedos e ira contra los sirvientes de nuestra tripulación. Como habría sido una falta de respeto confinarlos, hemos recurrido a medidas alternativas suministrando grandes cantidades de amasec y estupefacientes».

languages.text: "Die geschätzten Adeligen und ihre Familien haben ihrem Status entsprechende Quartiere erhalten. Die Schrecken des Massakers in den Straßen sind noch frisch. Deshalb haben sie anfangs regelmäßige Ausflüge auf die unteren Decks gemacht, um ihre Ängste und ihre Wut an Mitgliedern unserer Crew auszulassen. Da es respektlos gewesen wäre, die Adeligen in ihren Quartieren festzusetzen, haben wir uns darauf verlegt, sie mit reichlich Amasec und anderen Rauschmitteln gefügig zu machen."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed nobles and their families were given quarters befitting their status. The horrors of the massacre in the streets are still fresh in their minds, so initially they made regular trips to the lower decks to take out their fears and anger on serfs from our own crew. It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."

languages.text: "Değerli soylulara ve ailelerine statülerine yakışır odalar tahsis edildi. Sokaklarda gerçekleşen katliamın dehşeti zihinlerinde hâlâ taze, bu yüzden de ilk başta alt güvertelere düzenli yolculuklar yapıp korkularını ve öfkelerini mürettebatımız bünyesindeki kölelerden çıkarıyorlardı. Soyluların kendi kompartımanlarından çıkmalarını yasaklamak saygısızca olurdu, bu yüzden de onlara cömert bir şekilde amasek ve sarhoş edici başka maddeler sağlayarak başka bir şekilde sınırlamalar getirdik."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed nobles and their families were given quarters befitting their status. The horrors of the massacre in the streets are still fresh in their minds, so initially they made regular trips to the lower decks to take out their fears and anger on serfs from our own crew. It would have been disrespectful to confine the nobles to their compartments, so we used shackles of a different sort by generously supplying them with amasec and intoxicants."
